message.name: HTTP_404_NOTE_ID_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record was found for the specified note_id. Please specify a valid note_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_CASE_ID_NOT_FOUND
message.locale: No record was found for the specified case_id. Please specify a valid case_id and try again.

message.name: HTTP_404_CASE_AND_NOTE_MISMATCH
message.locale: The specified note does not belong to the specified case.
